title: Harry Potter VR Spell Dueler
detail: A virtual reality spell dueler using Google cardboard.
extended_details: Using **Google cardboard**, we will write a web application that manipulates reality using a smartphone's camera. We will draw over reality spells and their effects for players of the game. We hope to have an N player game, but will shoot for 2 for demoing. **All you should need to play this game is just your smartphone**, Google cardboard, and a wand of your own choosing!

parts_and_costs.part: Amazon.com: Harry Potter Ollivanders Wand - Sirius Black: Toys & Games
I AM CARDBOARD® VR CARDBOARD KIT WITH NFC - I AM Cardboard
Amazon.com: Dritz 9507B Non-Roll Woven Elastic, Black, 1-Inch
